title: Diamond Emerald Petal Cascade Haaram - Vaiduryam Virajam
materials: Natural Emerald Center Stone. Features Hyderabadi Polish for enhanced luster and longevity.
features: This Haaram features a unique petal cascade design, with diamond-studded floral motifs gracefully suspended from a delicate diamond link chain. The central pendant showcases a vibrant emerald, framed by intricate diamond detailing. The setting is designed to maximize the sparkle of each diamond, creating a dazzling display. Features a secure, easy-to-use clasp.
occasions: and other special occasions. A perfect statement piece for formal events or to add a touch of elegance to your everyday attire.
description: This exquisite Haaram blends contemporary design with classic elegance. The brilliant diamonds and vibrant emerald create a mesmerizing contrast, while the Hyderabadi polish ensures a lasting shine. A timeless piece that will be treasured for generations.
